name: Extend Post Data
author: Say Hello GmbH

sections.description: Automatically extends Post and Page data with an array containing all of the extra meta data pertinent to the $post object.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The $post object will contain a sub-object $post->metadata after running a regular WordPress query, containing any additional meta information assigned to the Post.

short_description: Extend Post and Page data with all related meta data.
